line.en: '...Umm... what made you think that?'
Why would she say something like that all of a\nsudden?
'When we were in the bath, that's what Kotori and\nAgeha said.'
'That the one that you like must be me.'
What the hell?
'...The way they're talking about it makes it\nsound like I definitely have a secret crush on\nsomeone.'
'Is that why you thought you'd ask me about it?'
Amane has a kind of naive look on her face as she\nnods deeply.
That's the kind of thing that you don't just go\nup to someone and ask them.
'I see...Is that so...?'
Amane starts muttering to herself as she looks\nback towards the designs.
At that moment, she goes back to her\n'concentrating face'.
After I finish drinking my barley tea, I stand up\nand go to wash the glass.
'Well then, I'm off to bed now.'
She can't hear me...
I gently turned the electric fan in Amane's\ndirection, then left the dining hall.
'...Phew... I felt so nervous...!'
As I close the door behind me with one hand, I\nput the other on the left side of my chest.
My heart was still pounding.
'To think she'd suddenly ask me a thing like\nthat...'
Regardless of whether or not I like her, to have\nsomeone that pretty look me in the eyes and ask\n'Do you like me?' left me a little flustered.
I lay down on my bed and it felt like the\nthrobbing in my heart wouldn't go away for a\nlittle while.
